title: craftbukkit-1.3.1-R1.0.jar如何安装MOD？
author: aqa
txt_content: craftbukkit-1.3.1-R1.0.jar服务器，如何安装动物单车mod?需要在服务器里安装什么嘛？modloadermp还是forge？能说的详细些，最好给个地址

replies.author: Momo丶小凌
replies.txt_content:
aqa 发表于 2012-9-1 16:38 
问题是我找不到1.3.1能用的modloadermp
呐~~地址在这1.3.1的
http://dl.vmall.com/c0tzei0ibx

replies.author: huangwenhui020
replies.txt_content: 插件区可以找到你想要的插件：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... age=1&mobile=no

replies.author: Momo丶小凌
replies.txt_content: 安装mp~~然后双击会出现config和mods文件夹.然后把bukkit支持的mod放进mods文件夹重启下服务器就行了

replies.author: Momo丶小凌
replies.txt_content:
如果不会安装...这里有安装好的bukkit服务端.
放下网址.https://github.com/MinecraftPortCentral/CraftBukkit/downloads
